q: Moreover, says Slezak, Simon Cowell was someone who could deliver`` succinct, brutally honest and witty'' critiques in an off-the-cuff fashion.`` Simon Cowell was the voice of the people,'' he says. He had a very specific skill that not everyone can pull off. Even Ellen DeGeneres , who has been an Oscar host couldn't do it-- and that was a shock to me.
